titles.title: Recognizing the Importance of Critical Minerals in Healthcare Act of 2023
Recognizing the Importance of Critical Minerals in Healthcare Act of 2023
Recognizing the Importance of Critical Minerals in Healthcare Act of 2023
Recognizing the Importance of Critical Minerals in Healthcare Act of 2023
Recognizing the Importance of Critical Minerals in Healthcare Act of 2023
Recognizing the Importance of Critical Minerals in Healthcare Act of 2023

To amend the Energy Act of 2020 to require the Secretary of the Interior to include the Secretary of Health and Human Services in consultations regarding designations of critical minerals, elements, substances, and materials.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.
Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources Discharged
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.
Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 118-710.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 602.

action.text: Mr. Tiffany moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 6395.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Discharged, Referred To

bill.summary:
Recognizing the Importance of Critical Minerals in Healthcare Act of 2023
This act requires the Department of the Interior to include the Department of Health and Human Services in consultations regarding designations of critical minerals, elements, substances, and materials.
